entry.description: Causes the element to gain its parent's computed value for the property.
The default value of any property.
If the cascaded value of a property is the 'unset' keyword, then if it is an inherited property, this is treated as 'inherit', and if it is not, this is treated as 'initial'.

CssProperty.name: all
CssProperty.description: The 'all' property is a shorthand that resets all CSS properties except 'direction' and 'unicode-bidi'.
